page.title: 11HOUSING
page.content: HOUSING SURVEY FOR THE PUPILS AT ST. PAUL'S CHURCH OF ENGLAND SCHOOL. In a class survey we found the following. 40% of the children lived in a detached house,28% lived in a semi- detached house and 16% lived in a terraced house. It was difficult to date all the homes but 4% were pre 1900,12% were between 1900 and 1940 and 16% were between 1920 and 1940 and 16% were between 1940 and the present day. Our street survey indicates that the vast majority of houses were built between the wars while a few are pre 1914.The vast majority were owner- occupied.
